original: Blixt, Nils Ivar, länsarbetsdirektör, Skövde, f. 7/3/93 i Brevik, Skarab. 1. G. 27 m. Torborg Orrmell. Barn: Börje f. 29, Ingrid 31, Birgitta 35. — Kont:förest. 15, arb :förmedl :dir. 34, länsarb :dir. 40. Led. av kyrkoråd fr. 20, kyrkofullm. fr. 31. Medl. av Odd Fel-low, Rotary kl. RVOlkl, Dansik FrM.
translated: Blixt, Nils Ivar, county labor director, Skövde, b. March 7th, 1893 in Brevik, Skaraborg. 1st marriage in 1927 to Torborg Orrmell. Children: Börje b. 1929, Ingrid b. 1931, Birgitta b. 1935. Work experience: department head in 1915, employment agency director in 1934, county labor director in 1940. Member of the church council since 1920, church representative since 1931. Member of Odd Fellow, Rotary club. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.
